main: Starts encounters with 100 {status:FirePunchFuel}. At 50-, it converts into {status:FirePunchFuelOverheated}.
His skills consume either fuel to inflict {status:Combustion} and increase damage (15 for S1, 20 for S2, 25 for S3). Using {status:FirePunchFuelOverheated} further increases the damage bonus.
His defense skill refuels him to 100 but resets it to {status:FirePunchFuel}.
other: His passive increases his damage based on the total amount of {status:FirePunchFuel} and {status:FirePunchFuelOverheated} spent, and it's further increased vs Bloodfiends, Bloodbags, or targets with 30+ {status:Combustion} Potency+Count.
If he's not out of fuel, his passive also inflicts {status:Combustion} on other enemies whenever he staggers or kills enemies with {status:Combustion}.

1121101.desc:
Deal +0.2% damage for every [FirePunchFuel] and [FirePunchFuelOverheated] this unit consumed in this Encounter (max 40%)
- If the main target is a <Bloodfiend>, <Bloodbag>, or if they have 30+ ([Combustion] + [Combustion] Count), deal +0.3% damage instead (max 60%)

At 1+ [FirePunchFuel] or [FirePunchFuelOverheated], if this unit Staggers or defeats enemies with [Combustion], inflict +2 [Combustion] Count against 2 random enemies without [Combustion] or with the least [Combustion] Count (once per turn)
- For Focused Encounters, on Parts
1121101.name: I'm the only survivor...

1121102.desc:
Begin Encounters with 100 [FirePunchFuel]
- At over 50 Stack, become [FirePunchFuel]
- At 50 or less Stack, any [FirePunchFuel] becomes [FirePunchFuelOverheated]
1121102.name: District 12 Special Workshop Fuel

1121121.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed: On Hit, deal +5% more Wrath Damage for every 6 [Combustion] on the target (max 20%)
1121121.name: I hope they're from our Office...
